Translations.Text: Xaii! Wanag teemmlem taeemmaqt
Di laxeot, testehzayem
Udmawen, assen, ad feooeoen
Ar Mass nnsen, ad pmuqulen
Udmawen, assen, ad neeefen
Euan, i twa$it ad ppunefken
Xaii! Mi tuli ar irawen
ad inin: "anwa ay d agezzan
U ieua ar wagi d lefoaq
Imlal ufud ar ufud
Ar Mass ik, assen, tanheot
Ur iumin, ur ipealla
U irna inkeo, iwexxeo
Sinna, ar twacult is irra s pnefxa
A lwexda k, a lwexda
D$a, a lwexda k, a lwexda
Aani i$il umdan d ilelli i ippuserree
Aani ur illi d tiqqit iuzlen n l$ella
Sinna, iu$al d argen. D$a Ixleq, Imsel
Irra segs tayuga, ddkeo akked nnta
Aani Wa ur Izmir a d Issider lmeggtin
Day taadda tallit $ef umdan ideg ur illi d ayen ipwabedren
Ih, Nexleq amdan si tiqqit n l$ella ixelven. A t Njeooeb, Nerra t isell, ipwali
Nebbwi t d ubrid, ama isnemmir, ne$ inkeo
Nhegga, ih, i ijehliyen, sslasel, aruz, u$ud
Iaaoviyen, s tidep, ad swen, di lkas, ayen ixelien akked lkafuo
